info.name: FDDB - Dark Minimalism
info.description: Dark style, with a lot of minimalised ui. If you need all buttondescriptions, for example because you are new to fddb, this style could not be optimal for you. It should work on all pages of FDDB.de.
info.additionalInfo: Update: 15 Nov 2015 - Changed ext. image locations Update: 15 May 2015 - Search Results Fix Update: 08 May 2015 This was quite a hard one, not to say a nightmare to restyle. Check also my Youtube styles "Comfort Dark Red" and "Comfort Dark Blue"! https://userstyles.org/styles/113534 https://userstyles.org/styles/112336
